title: Your Highness, the Voice of Your Heart is Leaking! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Hidden Abilities   Kingdoms   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Marriage   R-15   Royalty   Shy Characters   Special Abilities   Stoic Characters   Tsundere
author: Shirohi   シロヒ
description:
Marriage with the villainous ‘Ice Emperor’—despite his harsh words, the voice of his heart is super sweet!?

The Princess of the Southern Kingdom, Tistye, who can read people’s heart, is married to Gaizel, the King of the Northern Kingdom, which is renowned for its outrageous cruelty.

Contrary to his relentless cold words, she can hear the voice of his heart, which is surprisingly mellow—his gap almost causes her to die of embarrassment!>
